text:
@MattHancock Cheltenham races had a great affect upon the virus spread.  with some schools also restarting on Monday, I think you are pre-empting the whole issue, at risk to ALL!

#CONservatives 
#ScrewingEveryoneOverEveryDay
#COVID19
